WordPress Freelancer Barcelona

With Barcelonas WordPress Webdesign Service, I am offering an overall service for your WordPress page which includes transferring your old page to a fresh & new WordPress installation, Fixing WordPress Errors, Debugging your Code, adapt WordPress to your needs (Displaying an Instagram Feed after your blog post for example), coding and designing a User Interface and of course - helping you, to find and to manage all the Plugins out there.



WordPress is one of the most famous Content Management Systems out there. It is open-source and it has an unbelievable community. WordPress is widely used from Barcelona to the whole world. Very famous pages like for example, Walt Disney are using WordPress as their CMS.
